# Alexander Honkala Personal Website

## Description
This is the personal website of Alexander Honkala, featuring a generative art background of a starling murmuration.

## Navigation
- [Research](/research.html) - Links to academic and personal research.
- [Likes](/likes.html) - Curated list of interests and inspirations.
- [Writing](/writing.html) - Blog posts and essays.

## Context
Alexander Honkala is a researcher and developer interested in generative art, complex systems, and web technologies. This site serves as a digital garden and portfolio.

## Technical Details
- Built with Vite and Vanilla JS.
- Murmuration effect uses Craig Reynolds' Boids algorithm with spatial grid optimization.
- Interactive elements include mouse attraction and UI repulsion.
